title: Workshop on Developing Technology-Enhanced Strategies for Innovating English Teaching Methodologies in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic English teaching methodologies and experience using digital tools at secondary level or higher
context.additional_context: Practical-focused course for corporate educators emphasizing smartphone-based technology utilization and project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can complete two or more student-centered English lesson designs using mobile-based digital tools (e.g., Padlet, Quizlet)
Learners can develop one integrated math-English lesson set utilizing open educational resources (OER)
Learners can improve their technology-enhanced lesson designs at least three times through a peer feedback system and submit a final project report

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
